title.narrative: Conducive policy environment and enhanced institutional capacities of governance institutions to prevent and respond toall forms of violence against women

description.narrative: This outcome focuses on increasing the capacity of national and sub-national institutions and their staff for EVAW

participating-org.narrative: Germany - Ministry for Economic Cooperation and Development

description.narrative: Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities - social services (incl youth development and women+ children)

provider-org.narrative: Germany - Ministry for Economic Cooperation and Development
Germany - Ministry for Economic Cooperation and Development
